duties_responsibilities.duty: Conduct extensive company and industry research in partnership with senior analyst.
Create financial models and valuation analyses.
Write company reports, industry reports, and investment recommendations.
Meet with company management teams and interview company customers, suppliers, and competitors.
Make company visits and attend trade shows and industry conferences.
Market research and investment recommendations to the sales force and institutional investors.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Accounting or Finance required.
Securities Industry Essentials, Series 86 and 87 required (or willingness to obtain). Progress towards CFA a plus.
